page.title: 20NEWS FROM CATERHAM 28 6 85
page.content:
{HILLCROFT SCHOOL}makes front page news today when class 4I of Hillcroft Middle School went to Willey Park Farm, Chaldon collecting information for the Domesday Project.
{CANNABIS}resin was found on a shop counter in Purley. The people involved were the owners of thr shop. They were also supplying L.S.D. and heroin. The discovery was the result of a{DRUGS {RAID}on a greengrocers shop.
{ST LAWRENCES HOSPITAL}is desperate for staff. This hospital has just over 600 nurses working in shifts to care for 1200 long-term mentally handicapped residents. A national survey in 1980 revealed that this hospital (one of the largest in the country) needed more staff.
